signup.disclaimer: By creating an account you accept our terms of use, privacy policy, consent to cookies being stored on your device, and agree that we may contact you with relevant information. You can unsubscribe or request your account is deactivated at any time.

section.subtitle: From information about healthcare to legal considerations, discover everything you need to know about buying a property in {{countryName}}

cookie_policy.text: Kyero uses data and cookies to give you a better experience, to analyse traffic, and may be used for personalised and non-personalised advertising

links.helpful_links: Here are some helpful links instead:

bcorp.copy: Kyero is here to help you find your sunshine, helping you navigate your entire journey and giving you the inspiration, information and tools that put you in control.

for_agents.cta: Find out how Kyero can help you sell more properties

email.invalid: Please provide a valid email address

fallback.text: Find your sunshine with confidence. Written by experts, our guides and advice section will help you make the right decisions.

agents_section.copy: We work with over 10,000 estate agents across Europe. Find the right estate agent to fulfil your requirements and take that next step to finding your dream property
agents_section.title: Find the right estate agent for you

faq_section.title: Frequently asked questions about property in {{countryName}}

intro_newsletter.subtitle: Every Sunday you'll get a regular weekly email with the latest properties we think you’ll love. Look out for your first email this coming Sunday!

success.subtitle: We'll use it to make sure we recommend properties that have all the things you need, so you're one step closer to finding your sunshine.
success.title: We've saved your information

error.subtitle: We’re having trouble doing what you asked. The problem is at our end, not yours. Please click the button to retry or come back later.
error.title: Something’s not working properly
